website_summaries.verdict: This shoe gets high marks in terms of its support, stability, and comfort.
pros: Soft leather offers a great fit and feel
Laces up the front and zips up the side for maximum support
cons: Lacks arch support, so think about upgrading this shoe with your favorite insole
Those with larger calves may find this to be a tight fit

customer_reviews.title: GoodBoots
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, decent fit. Zipper is obscured by material, so it doesn't look too obvious/doesn't cut or scrape anyone. Footing is a little slippery on the ropes, but these aren't designed for that. Leather material is awesome. Using the zipper after a match is way better than untying/unlacing.
customer_reviews.author: P. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Never going to take them off
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable - a little difficult to get off but then if I'm too tired to take them off, no problem - they are so darn comfortable I'll just sleep in them - perfect for those tough workouts and sparing matches
customer_reviews.author: David Stihler

customer_reviews.title: Hope seller can correct issue
customer_reviews.text: Boots are amazing and comfortable. Though after 5 days of wear the sole of the boot is detaching like they where only glued instead of sewn to the leather of boot. These boots would have got a 5 star from me if sole wasn’t detaching after a week of wear
customer_reviews.author: Dustin i.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure these are great shoes for people without large calves
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these are great shoes for people without large calves. Unfortunately, I'm a woman with rather large calves, and even with the laces loosened to their max, I still felt like I was going to bust the zipper stitching. The leather felt nice, but I definitely like my Rivals better.
customer_reviews.author: Dearra Ginder

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, hard to find in stores
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, hard to find in stores, and I love them. They shape to your feet after one or two sessions. I would highly recommend. The zipper is strong and effective. I replaced the laces for white and longer laces. I would highly recommend for friends.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Never disappointed with Reyes products. It's the case of you get what you pay for. I've tried the Title boots for $39.99, and paying an extra $60 for the Reyes is definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bummy Jabz

customer_reviews.title: RIPPED AFTER 1 DAY.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great fit. clean. light. excellent ankle support. cons: zipper catches once every other zipping. THE TONGUE RIPPED OUT AFTER 1 DAY OF USE. I didn't even pull on it hard; just a light adjustment. really hoping I just got a bad pair.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Villalvazo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I train extensively on concrete surfaces. I like the zipper convenience. These are like a glove and have good foot stability. I add an inner sole support.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Lam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These feel like leather socks with a sole. perfect for sparring or on fight night.
customer_reviews.author: B. Estep

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots Size 12
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12.5 feet size and the size 12 is perfect. I put a soft arch insert for my personal comfort. These are as soft and comfortable as you will ever buy. AA++ boot
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Michael Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes I have fat feet rubbed my ankle to much wish they did fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love them easy to take off and put on because ...
customer_reviews.text: love them easy to take off and put on because of the zipper on the side very comfortable love them
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: best I have ever had for boxing
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather strong support, best I have ever had for boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Mao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfactory leather. I do not understand why they sell at this price.
customer_reviews.author: jong hoon moon

customer_reviews.title: Will buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Fit is perfect and exactly as I had hoped. I wear them as sneakers. Great look and lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cady-Archilla

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I just bought for a friend, not for me. Good design and confortability. It were a good deal. I don't know more.
customer_reviews.author: David Santiago Aguilar Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 12 and the shoes are too big. I returned them for a size 11 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CA LOVE

customer_reviews.title: Best Boxing Boots I've Ever Owen
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful boxing boot that is worth the money. Only issue I may have is that I noticed the soles may only be glued on instead of sewn. I do t know if this will be an issue because the product is legit and great quality. The zipper on the side makes getting them on and off easy. Lining seems to be quality padding and cotton/poly material that is comfortable on the leg since these go up to mid calf and is also absorbent. I am very happy I spent the $40 more than the Adidas shoes I usually buy and wear out in about 6-8 months of training.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Vredevelt

customer_reviews.title: Cleto Reyes Leather Top Boxing Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These by far are the best made boxing boots But I would say if you wear a size 10 for example too get a extra bigger size cause they are kinda hard too get on they are heavy but that might just because they are high top but by far i recommanded getting these boots they are a work of art By Far Nicest Boxing boots I use So far 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: the way a boxing boot should be, very well made, THE best leather and materials
customer_reviews.text: im going from a roy jones jr boot and i was a 12 in them, i ordered the same for the reyes, im actually an 11 1/2 in my normal shoes, but they didnt have half sizes so i ordered up a size. i should have went with 11. im a competitive fighter with years of experience and these boots will go the distance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cleto Reyes Leather Lace Up High Top Boxing Shoes - Black
product_meta.description: Lightweight shoes designed especially for boxing. Polyurethane insole, light non-skid rubber sole reduces impact. Wide upper and laces eliminate flexion strain and provide comfortable fit. Rounded tip, lace up the front and side zipper. Manufactured with leather and suede.
feature_bullets: Lightweight shoes designed especially for boxing
Polyurethane insole, light non-skid rubber sole reduces impact
Wide upper and laces eliminate flexion strain and provide comfortable fit
Rounded tip, lace up the front and side zipper
